name: Fear The Darkness (Tanguy Le crom)
description:
Hello

This is my first game with unity, based on a tutorial of unity hitself. I've made it 4 mouths earlier so the quality is not very awesome.

Eddie the little boy fear the darkness, help him to find an exit and beat the monsters.

You will have to play with arrows or WASD.

It's a rogue-like mix with a die & retry (i love mixing genres).

Let me a comment please !

Enjoy it!

On your own !
